trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SEQ_00<tab>Clive seems somewhat bemused. ※This quest is available for a limited time only.

TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SEQ_01<tab>Clive confesses bemusement at the minstrel's plan, but is nonetheless willing to follow his instructions. After explaining the way to Apkallu Falls, you set off for your nearby destination.
※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SEQ_02<tab>Judging by Clive's reaction to the mention of Ifrit, the wandering minstrel believes he has identified the root cause of the scarlet star's amnesia. His lyrical magicks weave a replica of the Bowl of Embers, within which you and Clive confront the Lord of the Inferno─an entity which soon blurs and changes to more closely match the creature of Clive's befogged memories.

TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SEQ_03<tab>At the culmination of his fiery duel, Clive breaks through his mental barrier, and at last accepts the truth that the monstrous beast before him...is himself. You then return victorious to the real world, but it seems you have not returned alone: Clive's resolve has manifested an old companion from the swirling aether. The loyal Torgal will serve as a guide to lead Clive home to his own world─or so the delighted musician asserts. And after listening to the continuation of Clive's harrowing tale, the minstrel is adamant that this journey begin at the beginning: the Burning Wall.

TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SEQ_04<tab>Now that you have arrived in the vicinity, the minstrel looks to Torgal to lead Clive the rest of the way. But will the hound guide his master true as the minstrel believes?

TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SEQ_05<tab>With Torgal in the lead, you set off alongside Clive and the minstrel. The destination you seek appears to lie somewhere within the twists and turns of the Burning Wall...
※If you part ways with Clive and the wandering minstrel or fall behind Torgal, return to the starting point and speak with Clive, the wandering minstrel, or Torgal to try again.

TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SEQ_06<tab>You accompany Clive back to the very spot where you first found him. It seems the Burning Wall's relation to the Phoenix of your world played a part in Clive's unexpected arrival, a connection forged by the bond with his brother─the Phoenix of his world. With memories restored and answers yet to find, Clive bids you farewell as his time in Eorzea comes to an end.

TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SEQ_07<tab>Now that you have seen Clive safely home to Valisthea, the wistful minstrel declares the adventure over. He rewards you for indulging his strange request, presenting you with a whistle to summon a likeness of Clive's loyal hound, Torgal. Though your time together was short, you cannot help but wonder what further trials await Clive on his own star, some unimaginable distance away...
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Clive.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Clive.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the wandering minstrel at the Burning Wall.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Clive and have him accompany you.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_TODO_04<tab>Follow Torgal's lead, then speak with Clive at the designated location.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_TODO_05<tab>Speak with the wandering minstrel.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_001<tab>The minstrel has a plan, it seems, but he shares little beyond confusing metaphor...
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_002<tab>Still, I'm willing to indulge him if it means making progress.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_003<tab>We're to meet him at “Apkallu Falls,” right? And where is that to be found?
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_004<tab>Good─not far, then. Let's get on with it.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_010<tab>This place...? Why here?
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_011<tab>Because this waterfall is where the legendary Archon Louisoix gathered a band of adventurers in the time of the Seventh Umbral Calamity.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_012<tab>Their purpose: to extinguish the infernal Ifrit.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_013<tab>Ifrit!?
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_014<tab>Hngh. I know something is there, I just... Why can't I <var 1A 02 /var>remember<var 1A 01 /var>!?

TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_015<tab>Clive recalled several words in the Elder Seedseer's presence─words which brought him pain. While the significance of “Bearer” eludes me, you and I are more than familiar with “Ifrit.”

TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_100_015<tab>Considering your reaction to the mere mention of the name, 'tis likely that the primal─or its equivalent in your world─is deeply connected to your condition.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_016<tab>Thus have I resolved to weave my lyrical magicks and bring you face-to-face with the Ifrit of our world.

TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_017<tab>Here, where Archon Louisoix paved an aetherial path to the primal's lair, will my words be given substance. And within the vision which takes form will you do battle with a phantom of our minds' creation.

TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_018<tab>Imaginary though this confrontation may be, I fear your suffering will be all too real. Yet you must persevere, for your hidden truth will not be unearthed without hardship.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_019<tab>Take heart, scarlet star, and call upon the strength of your shining twin! Your past awaits!
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SYSTEM_100_019<tab>You must be a Disciple of War or Magic of level 50 or above to proceed.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_020<tab>Where has he sent us!?

TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_021<tab>(-Wandering Minstrel-)You stand in the Bowl of Embers, the site where the Amalj'aa summoned their patron deity...and the stage upon which the Warrior of Light became a slayer of gods.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_022<tab>(-Wandering Minstrel-)'Tis but convincing illusion─the body of recounted tale given breath by fanciful verse.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_023<tab>(-Wandering Minstrel-)Come forth, Lord of the Inferno!
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_024<tab>(-Wandering Minstrel-)An accurate facsimile, yet not quite the Ifrit you know.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_025<tab>No. Not quite the same...
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_026<tab>Hngggh!
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_A1_000_001<tab>It's time to uncover the truth!
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_A1_000_002<tab>Ready when you are!
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_028<tab>Alright. Time to find out who I am.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_029<tab>Together, then.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_030<tab>Ifrit...
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_031<tab>That's the <var 1A 02 /var>thing<var 1A 01 /var> which killed Joshua! Yes...I've been on its trail, seeking vengeance for my brother!
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_032<tab>This fiend must pay. Fight with me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SYSTEM_100_032<tab>During this battle, you will gain access to special duty actions as follows:
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SYSTEM_200_032<tab>Use <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Rising Flames<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to charge the foe and inflict high damage.

TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SYSTEM_300_032<tab>With the proper timing, you can use <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Dodge<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to avoid taking damage, even if you are within the area of an enemy's attack.

TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SYSTEM_400_032<tab>Certain enemy attacks will be preceded by a countdown icon. When this countdown progresses to the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Dodge<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> icon, quickly use the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Dodge<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> action.

TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SYSTEM_500_032<tab>After executing a successful dodge, the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Dodge<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> action will change to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Precision Strike<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, which provides an opportunity to inflict additional damage.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_033<tab>I blamed another...to spare myself the guilt.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_034<tab>I feared that by accepting it, I would lose what little was left of me.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_035<tab>But I accept the truth of it now.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_036<tab>You are not Ifrit. I am.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_038<tab>(-Wandering Minstrel-)In the battle against your own mind, 'twould seem you have emerged the victor.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_039<tab>(-Wandering Minstrel-)Intriguing...
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_040<tab>The illusion is unraveled, yet you've brought a friend back with you...
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_041<tab>This is Torgal, a wolf pup raised in the duchy. There is no more loyal ally in battle, and no keener guide when the road ahead is uncertain.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_042<tab>Ah... That would explain the aberration in the lingering aether. Torgal is here to lead you back to your own world.

TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_043<tab>Clive has embraced his harrowing past, and in doing so reclaimed the memories he lost. Though not a conscious act, he has manifested his readiness to return home in the form of a trusted companion.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_044<tab>Even so, it was...difficult...to accept what I'd done.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_045<tab>My younger brother─Joshua─was a kind and gifted soul.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_046<tab>The inheritor of the Phoenix's flames, he was destined to become archduke, as our father had before him. But Joshua was murdered. His bright future cut short.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_047<tab>From that day onwards, I lived for one purpose alone. A Dominant of Fire had slain my brother, and I would have my revenge.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_048<tab>I spent years tracking the killer, until one day...I came to understand it had been me all along.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_049<tab>I was young and distraught when I first summoned Ifrit. I hadn't known such power lurked within me─or that it could even exist at all.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_050<tab>The transformation was instinctive, uncontrolled... And it was by my hand that Joshua died.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_051<tab>I can but imagine the anguish this caused you.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_052<tab>There was anguish, yes, and a guilt I will never escape. But I cannot let it stop me.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_100_052<tab>I was born the vessel for Ifrit's power, and I need to know why.

TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_053<tab>It was in search of answers that I went to Phoenix Gate, and delved into the ruins below. There I found the courage to face my past and accept the truth─and then everything faded to black.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_054<tab>Hmmm, your tale suggests that something in the ruins─some mysterious force─was responsible for your inadvertent journey.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_055<tab>And if you arrived in Eorzea from a place sacred to the Phoenix and its flames, then it stands to reason...
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_056<tab>Yes? What are you thinking?
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_057<tab>I'm thinking that to see you home, then we must return to the beginning. Our road takes us back to the Burning Wall!
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_058<tab>Once there, your furry comrade will lead us exactly where we need to go.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_TORGAL_000_060<tab>......
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SYSTEM_000_061<tab>Torgal's ears are pricked up, his senses focused on his surrounds.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_065<tab>Such an incredible sight. I was in no state to appreciate these crystals the first time...
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_070<tab>We've come this far. Now Torgal will be our guide.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_071<tab>Such was the purpose of his creation, after all.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_080<tab>Ready, Torgal? Take me home.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_TORGAL_000_081<tab><bark>
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SYSTEM_000_082<tab>Once you choose to depart, Clive and the wandering minstrel will accompany you. Torgal will then begin leading you onwards.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SYSTEM_000_083<tab>Follow Torgal to his destination and try not to fall behind.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SYSTEM_000_084<tab>If you leave Clive or the minstrel for any reason, or lose sight of Torgal, you may try again by returning to the starting point.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_Q1_000_085<tab>Follow Torgal?
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_TORGAL_000_086<tab><bark>
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SYSTEM_000_087<tab>Once you choose to depart, Clive and the wandering minstrel will accompany you. Torgal will then begin leading you onwards.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_090<tab>I'll be back soon, Jill...
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_TORGAL_000_092<tab><bark>
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_094<tab>I sense the end to this extraordinary tale is at hand.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_Q2_000_095<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_A2_000_096<tab>Talk.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_A2_000_097<tab>Part ways.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_A2_000_098<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_099<tab>Don't mind me. Keep an eye on Torgal.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_100_099<tab>A brief fellowship, formed beneath the wings of the Phoenix... 'Tis worthy of a poem in itself.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_Q3_101_099<tab>Are you sure you wish to part ways with your companions?
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_102_099<tab>Feeling lost? Maybe we should head back and start over.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_103_099<tab>...Leave? Some matter of heroic importance, I trust? Very well, we shall await your return at the spot where this expedition began.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_104_099<tab>Come, Torgal is eager to run.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_105_099<tab>I am ever ready to wander!
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SYSTEM_106_099<tab>Once you choose to depart, Clive and the wandering minstrel will accompany you. Torgal will then begin leading you onwards.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SYSTEM_107_099<tab>Your companions have yet to arrive. Be sure they are at your side before attempting to continue.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_108_099<tab>Right, let's try this again.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_109_099<tab>One can be forgiven for putting a foot wrong when faced with the sorrow of parting. No matter, we simply begin once more from the beginning.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SYSTEM_110_099<tab>Speak with Torgal at the Burning Wall to try again.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_100<tab>Is this it, boy?
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_101<tab>The tale ends where it began.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_102<tab>Where you first found me?
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_103<tab>Indeed.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_104<tab>I was baffled as to why this, of all places, would serve as a junction between our two worlds. But now I think I understand.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_105<tab>You do?
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_106<tab>Some years ago, Eorzea was visited by a cataclysmic disaster known as the “Seventh Umbral Calamity.”
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_107<tab>Yet even as fire and ruin threatened all we held dear, the world underwent a mystical renewal. 'Twas as if the star was reborn.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_108<tab>One theory attributes the miracle to a benevolent entity, claiming that the undying Phoenix flared into being to save us in our hour of direst need.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_109<tab>The Phoenix!?

TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_110<tab>The Burning Wall itself is a scar left by those events, its crystal ridges having erupted from the earth overnight. Some believe these monoliths of solidified flame to be proof of the Phoenix's deliverance.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_111<tab>The bond with your brother, the Phoenix of your world, may have been the connection which brought you to this sacred place in ours.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_112<tab>Drawn to the flame...
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_113<tab>It seems our time together is at an end.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_114<tab>Thank you both for all you've done.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_Q4_000_115<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_A4_100_115<tab>Press on, friend. No matter how daunting the hardship, or bitter the truth.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_A4_200_115<tab>May your journeys be fair.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_116<tab>Always. No matter what fate awaits at journey's end...
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_117<tab>And yours as well. You don't seem the type to stand still.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_CLIVE_000_118<tab>Come, Torgal. We have answers to seek, and Valisthea awaits.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_119<tab>And then he was gone.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_120<tab>I feel the stirrings of a ballad...
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_121<tab>...But, nay. 'Twould be hubris to imagine I could capture Clive's story from so fleeting an excerpt.

TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_122<tab>That honor belongs to someone else─someone privileged to see his tale to its conclusion. Sadly, the power to peer into other worlds was not granted me by this day's miracles.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_123<tab>I wonder, however, if <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> might manage it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_130<tab>Our little adventure is over. Set in motion as it was by a dream most cryptic, I must thank you for indulging my sudden and strange request.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_131<tab>As for your promised reward, I hope this is sufficient?
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_132<tab>Torgal proved such a trustworthy guide that I thought to bind his likeness to a summoning whistle.
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_133<tab>May his loyal spirit serve you well on your travels. Until we meet again!
TEXT_FESSXT103_04798_SYSTEM_000_140<tab>You can now exchange MGP for special items by speaking with the Gold Saucer attendant at the Gold Saucer.
